report.title: balanceDueList
report.sql: select member.last_name ,member.first_name ,member.address1 ,member.address2 ,member.home_phone ,member.work_phone ,member.email ,member.school_grade ,sum(member_account.amount) balance from member, member_account where member.mbrid = member_account.mbrid group by member.last_name ,member.first_name ,member.address1 ,member.address2 ,member.home_phone ,member.work_phone ,member.email ,member.school_grade
